reviewText: Although made a while back, it's a great video with exercises and drills to take a soccer player to the next level. Had fortune of meeting Christopher Sullivan, who also happens to be an excellent coach in person.

of the 50+ training videos i have, this is easily the best. not all aspects will apply to everyone, as some of the physical training exercises shouldn't be done until the growth plates are fully formed. however, the skill exercises, the physical exercises, and how they blend into soccer with the picture in picture, is awesome. filmed at stanford and in italy, even pros will get something out of this dvd.
